Camila Cabello: crashed! ðŸ˜±
04 Nov 2019, 14:06 by BRAVO Team
Ouch, that hurts! At a concert in Los Angeles, Camila Cabello experienced a nasty crash - literally. The singer fell during the performance of the nearly two-meter-high stage. Her fans are very worried: Did the Latina get injured in her accident?
